languages.text: "Но это неправильно. Это не то, что ты на самом деле думаешь!" {n}— сервитор чуть наклоняет голову и смотрит... упрямо?{/n} "Мы наблюдали за тобой. Мы чувствовали тебя. Через кровь, через взгляд, через то, что нельзя описать. Мы уверены, что поняли правильно!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"
languages.original_text: "Но это неправильно. Это не то, что ты на самом деле думаешь!" {n}— сервитор чуть наклоняет голову и смотрит... упрямо?{/n} "Мы наблюдали за тобой. Мы чувствовали тебя. Через кровь, через взгляд, через то, что нельзя описать. Мы уверены, что поняли правильно!"

traits.locale_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

"But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

languages.text: « Mais c'est faux ! Ce n'est pas ce que vous pensez réellement ! » {n}Le servitor penche la tête et vous lance un regard... obstiné, semble-t-il.{/n} « Nous vous avons {mf|observé|observée}. Nous vous avons {mf|senti|sentie} par votre sang, votre regard et tout un tas de choses impossibles à décrire. Nous sommes certains d'avoir compris correctement les choses. »
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais c'est faux ! Ce n'est pas ce que vous pensez réellement ! » {n}Le servitor penche la tête et vous lance un regard... obstiné, semble-t-il.{/n} « Nous vous avons {mf|observé|observée}. Nous vous avons {mf|senti|sentie} par votre sang, votre regard et tout un tas de choses impossibles à décrire. Nous sommes certains d'avoir compris correctement les choses. »

languages.text: “但这是错误的，这不是你真正的想法！”{n}机仆侧过了头，然后……固执地看着你？{/n}“我们一直在观察你。我们感受到了你，通过你的血液，你的目光，以及所有无法形容的东西。我们确信我们的理解是正确的！”
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: “但这是错误的，这不是你真正的想法！”{n}奴工侧过了头，然后……固执地看着你？{/n}“我们一直在观察你。我们感受到了你，通过你的血液，你的目光，以及所有无法形容的东西。我们确信我们的理解是正确的！”

languages.text: "Aber das ist falsch. Das glaubt Ihr nicht wirklich!" {n}Der Servitor legt den Kopf schief und blickt dich ... stur an?{/n} "Wir haben Euch beobachtet. Wir haben Euch gespürt. Durch Euer Blut, Euren Blick und alles, was sich nicht beschreiben lässt. Wir sind sicher, dass wir verstanden haben!"
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber das ist falsch. Das glaubt Ihr nicht wirklich!" {n}Der Servitor legt den Kopf schief und blickt dich ... stur an?{/n} "Wir haben Euch beobachtet. Wir haben Euch gespürt. Durch Euer Blut, Euren Blick und alles, was sich nicht beschreiben lässt. Wir sind sicher, dass wir verstanden haben!"

languages.text: «Pero eso está mal. ¡No es lo que piensas en realidad!». {n}El servidor inclina la cabeza y te mira con una expresión... ¿obstinada?{/n} «Hemos estado observándote. Hemos logrado sentirte. Con tu sangre, tu mirada, y todo lo que no puede describirse. ¡Estamos seguros de que lo hemos entendido bien!».
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero eso está mal. ¡No es lo que piensas en realidad!». {n}El servidor inclina la cabeza y te mira con una expresión... ¿obstinada?{/n} «Hemos estado observándote. Hemos logrado sentirte. Con tu sangre, tu mirada, y todo lo que no puede describirse. ¡Estamos seguros de que lo hemos entendido bien!».

languages.text: 「しかし、それは誤りだ。あなたの思い違いだ！」{n}サーヴィターは頭を前に傾げ、頑なな表情でこちらを見ている。{/n}「私たちは、あなたを観察してきた。私たちは、あなたを感じてきた。あなたの血を通して、あなたのまなざしを通して、言葉では言い表せないすべてを感じ取ってきた。私たちは正しく理解したと確信している！」
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、それは誤りだ。あなたの思い違いだ！」{n}サーヴィターは頭を前に傾げ、頑なな表情でこちらを見ている。{/n}「私たちは、あなたを観察してきた。私たちは、あなたを感じてきた。あなたの血を通して、あなたのまなざしを通して、言葉では言い表せないすべてを感じ取ってきた。私たちは正しく理解したと確信している！」

languages.text: "Ama bu yanlış. Gerçek düşünceniz bu değil!" {n}Hizmetör, başını eğip sana... İnatla mı bakıyor?{/n} "Sizi gözlemliyorduk. Sizi hissettik. Kanınız, bakışlarınız ve tarif edilemeyen her şeyinizle hissettik. Doğru anladığımıza eminiz!"
languages.original_text: "But that is wrong. That is not what you really think!" {n}The servitor inclines its head and looks at you... stubbornly?{/n} "We have been observing you. We have felt you. Through your blood, your gaze, and all that cannot be described. We are certain we have understood correctly!"

traits.locale_text: "Ama bu yanlış. Gerçek düşünceniz bu değil!" {n}Servitör, başını eğip sana... İnatla mı bakıyor?{/n} "Sizi gözlemliyorduk. Sizi hissettik. Kanınız, bakışlarınız ve tarif edilemeyen her şeyinizle hissettik. Doğru anladığımıza eminiz!"
